plug._description: Rate controls on demand streaming using a fixed bitrate.

property.name: rate
property._description: The average rate to send all files at, in bits per second.

property.name: max-level
property._description: The maximum amount of data to send at full rate at any given moment, in bits.

property.name: initial-level
property._description: The initial amount of data that can be sent at full speed, in bits.

plug._description: Provides files from a local file system.

property.name: path
property._description: The base path to map to the mount-point

plug._description: Provides files from a locally mounted file system, with caching to a separate path.

property.name: path
property._description: The base local path to serve from, mapped to the mount-point

property.name: cache-dir
property._description: The directory where the files are cached. Multiple components can share the same cache-dir, but then should also share the same cache-size.

property.name: cache-size
property._description: The maximum size of the cache directory (in MB, defaults to 1000)

property.name: cleanup-enabled
property._description: Whether the cache should be monitored and cleaned up; if False, files will be served from the original location instead of from the cache

property.name: cleanup-high-watermark
property._description: Cache fill level that triggers cleanup (from 0.0 to 1.0, defaults to 1.0). If more than one component share the same cache directory, it's recommended to use slightly different values for each.

property.name: cleanup-low-watermark
property._description: Cache fill level to drop back to after cleanup (from 0.0 to 1.0, defaults to 0.6)

property.name: mount-point
property._description: The mount point on which the stream can be accessed.

property.name: path
property._description: The base path to map to the mount-point

property.name: type
property._description: 'master' to listen on a port, or 'slave' to slave to a porter (default master).

property.name: hostname
property._description: The server's host name to display.

property.name: description
property._description: The _description of the server.

property.name: bouncer
property._description: The name of a bouncer in the atmosphere to authenticate against.

property.name: issuer-class
property._description: The Python class of the Keycard issuer to use.

property.name: ip-filter
property._description: The IP network-address/prefix-length to filter out of logs.

property.name: port
property._description: The port to listen on (if type is 'master').

property.name: porter-socket-path
property._description: The path to the socket to communicate with the porter.

property.name: porter-username
property._description: The username to authenticate to the porter.

property.name: porter-password
property._description: The password to authenticate to the porter
